Name: Jorge Carvalho
Sumário:
Electronic Engineer, with expertise in industrial automation and IT markets. 

I'm currently responsible for the quality assurance of BEES Production evironment. I'm developing a master thesis at UNICAMP, in which I propose a new MPPT (Maximum Power Point Tracking) algorithm for photovoltaic systems.

I consider myself a problem solver and a lifelong learner that is passionate about technology & innovation.
Ocupação: QA – AB Inbev | Master's Degree student in Electrical Engineering – UNICAMP | Passionate about technology & innovation.
